Package ohos.agp.text

Class RawFont.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.RawFont.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RawFont

    public static final class RawFont.Builder
extends Object
    Provides a builder to create a RawFont instance.
    Since:
    7

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(ByteBuffer buffer)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Indicates the byte buffer, which must be a direct buffer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the specified buffer is not a direct buffer.
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the specified buffer is null.
        See Also:
        ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(int)

      • Builder

        public Builder​(File path)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified file.
        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the file path.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the specified path is null.

      • Builder

        public Builder​(FileDescriptor fileDescriptor)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified file descriptor.
        Parameters:
        fileDescriptor - Indicates the file descriptor.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the specified fileDescriptor is null.

      • Builder

        public Builder​(FileDescriptor fileDescriptor,
               long offset,
               long size)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified file descriptor and file offset.
        Parameters:
        fileDescriptor - Indicates the file descriptor.
        offset - Indicates the offset of the file.
        size - Indicates the data size. If size is set to -1, the actual file size is used.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the specified fileDescriptor is null.

      • Builder

        public Builder​(ResourceManager resourceManager,
               int resourceId)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified resource ID.
        Parameters:
        resourceManager - Indicates a resource manager, which is obtained using Context.getResourceManager().
        resourceId - Indicates the resource ID. The font file is stored in media, for example, ResourceTable.Media_yourfontfile.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if no data is obtained using the specified resourceId.

      • Builder

        public Builder​(ResourceManager resourceManager,
               String path)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified resource file path.
        Parameters:
        resourceManager - Indicates a resource manager, which is obtained using Context.getResourceManager().
        path - Indicates the path of the font file. The font file is stored in rawfile, for example, resources/rawfile/your_font_file.ttf.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if no data is obtained using the specified path.

    • Method Detail

      • setFontVariations

        public RawFont.Builder setFontVariations​(String variations)
        Sets a font variation axis. When the variation axis is empty, nothing happens.

        Note: When calling this method, you must know the valid variation axes of the corresponding font file and the valid ranges of the values.

        Parameters:
        variations - Indicates the font variation axis to set. For example, the string "'wght' 400,'ital' 1" means that the font is in italics and the font weight is 400.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder instance.

      • setItalic

        public RawFont.Builder setItalic​(boolean isItalic)
        Sets the font to be italic.
        Parameters:
        isItalic - Specifies whether to set the font to be italic. The value true means to set the font to be italic, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder instance.

      • setFontCollectionIndex

        public RawFont.Builder setFontCollectionIndex​(int fontCollectionIndex)
        Sets the index of the font collection.

        Note: When calling this method, you must know the valid index range of the corresponding font collection file. The value 0 is always valid.

        Parameters:
        fontCollectionIndex - Indicates the index of the font collection. You must ensure the validity of the index. The value 0 is always valid.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder instance.

      • setWeight

        public RawFont.Builder setWeight​(int weight)
        Sets the font weight.
        Parameters:
        weight - Indicates the font weight to set. The value ranges from 1 to 1000. Commonly used weights include Font#REGULAR, Font#MEDIUM, and Font#BOLD.
        Returns:
        Returns a Builder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the specified weight is not in the valid range.

      • build

        public RawFont build​()
              throws IOException
        A constructor used to create a RawFont instance based on your configurations.
        Returns:
        Returns a RawFont instance.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if the configurations passed to the Builder constructor are invalid.
